- The game against Detroit Lions took place on December 17, 1978.

The date difference between December 10, 1978, and December 17, 1978, is exactly one week. Therefore, the claim that "the game against the detroit lion take place 1 week after the game against the tampa bay buccaneer" is true based on the information provided in the table.
